description:
Lillia, the idol whose popularity exploded when she made her debut in America, is making her debut in Japan. Meanwhile, Komugi`s work is coming along well. Things are also going well for Kokona and Tsukasa, and the three girls draw closer to their dream of singing at the Tokyo Skydome together. However, one after another their jobs are suddenly canceled, all because of the supernova idol from America Lillia. Will the Japanese idol industry be taken over by Lillia?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 超新星リリア, スパーキング!
